title: Heisman Trophy Ceremony
summary: Bringing Broadway stagecraft to college football's highest honor. Annual scenic package for the Heisman Trophy ceremony at Jazz at Lincoln Center, featuring a hand-carved oversized trophy sculpture.
challenge: The Heisman Trophy is the most prestigious individual award in college football. ESPN and the Heisman Trust envisioned a production bringing Broadway-caliber values to the ceremony. The venue's 50-foot glass wall overlooking Central Park demanded scenic that would complement the iconic backdrop.
approach: Tony-nominated designer David Korins ('Hamilton,' 'Beetlejuice') created the scenic vision. Mystic delivers the complete package annually including a larger-than-life hand-carved Heisman Trophy replica by Rebecca Ward, winners portrait gallery for 91+ recipients, LED display housings, and automated scenic pieces.
result: The 2021 debut established Jazz at Lincoln Center as the ceremony's permanent home. Five consecutive ceremonies (2021â€“2025) demonstrate sustained client satisfaction, with recent winners including Bryce Young, Caleb Williams, Jayden Daniels, and Travis Hunter.

testimonial.quote: We wanted to bring the power of visual storytelling so often the trademark of great Broadway stages to the Heisman Trophy presentation.
